welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Wipperfurth! This charming city is known for its beautiful scenery, rich history, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and experience all that Wipperfurth has to offer and make unforgettable memories during your stay."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Cologne/bonn Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used by low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport for up to 3 hours.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal of Dortmund Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost carriers and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Düsseldorf International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Düsseldorf International Airport, primarily used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
